page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: MOST OF THE DIFFERENT TYPES OF HOUSING POPULAR AT THIS TIME CAN BE FOUND IN THIS PART OF REDDITCH.WE HAVE DETACHED HOUSES,SEMI-DETACHED HOUSES,TERRACED HOUSES,BUNGALOWS,AND FLATS.ALL THE HOUSES IN OUR AREA HAVE GARDENS,THEY HAVE BATHROOMS,WITH AN INDOOR TOILET SINK AND BATH.HALF OF THE HOMES IN OUR SMALL LOCAL SURVEY HAVE AN ADDITIONAL INDOOR TOILET.THERE ARE SEVERAL DIFFERENT WAYS OF HEATING THE HOUSES, {GAS CENTRAL HEATING}IS QUITE COMMON.{ELECTRICITY}IS USED TO HEAT THE WATER IN MANY HOUSES,AND SOME PEOPLE RELY ON ELECTRIC FIRES .OPEN OR {COAL FIRES}.IT IS QUITE COMMON FOR THERE TO BE A MIXTURE OF DIFFERENT FORMS OF HEATING.{WATER SUPPLY AND {SEWAGE DISPOSAL}.THESE ITEMS ARE CONNECTED TO ALL HOUSES;OUR PARENTS PAY A WATER RATE TO COVER THIS COST.
